name: Planet prototype
description:
A very bare bones proof of concept for a game where you are a satellite laser destroying monsters from space.  You need to navigate the globe to find the monsters, hopefully teaching the player more about where cities are located on  Earth.

Notes:

Escape key to quit (there's no menus)

There are very few cities

The cities are *pretty close) to their actual locations

The purple thing is a place holder monster

It's all placeholder (I spent about six hours on this!) so adjust your expectations!

Earth image attribution:

NASA Earth Observatory (NASA Goddard Space Flight Center), Public domain, via Wikimedia Commons
